Tenmiro Led Lights

Dedicated to providing personalized and fun life experiences

Tenmiro not only bring your home even life infinite daydream space, but also shock vitality. Come to Tenmiro, come to colorful home and life.

More Size

EASY TO INSTALL: Fully equipped accessories, it comes with 50ft Led light strip, power adapter, Ir remote control, controller and instruction manual, no need for any other devices, simply stick the strip lights on clean, dry surface. start to enjoy strip lighting
MULTIPLE SCENES AVAILABLE: 50ft Led strip lights long enough, suitable for home decor, it can be used for decorating your bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen, porch, cabinet, Christmas tree, bar. especially great for Holiday event decoration like Christmas, Halloween, party, birthday, new year, and more

TENMIRO Smart LED strip Lights

Humanized design.Intelligent APP offers you more joy.Vibrant, bright Led strip lights meet your need for colorful home decoration. Just a simple action, you can set these color changing lights according to your preference.

The LED strips are ideal for bedroom, kitchen, under cabinets, living rooms, TV backlighting, garden, balconies, patios, parties, holidays, or family events.

You can use virtually anywhere you want!

Led light color will change with the rhythm of the sound and music, dance with the strip lights！！

Color changing lights bring more fun to your party

Lights for bedroom can auto open/close at set time

LED light with easy adjustment of color and brightness

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable “Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.
LIGHT TO LIVE, WORK, RELAX AND PLAY – Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light (2200K to 6500K) for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors
Follow the sun – bring the outdoors inside and automate your lights to gradually shift color throughout the day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being and productivity
FAST PAIRING, NO HUB NEEDED – Bluetooth + WiFi makes pairing simple and easy. Guided setup takes you step-by-step to create the perfect smart home for you
VOICE CONTROL – Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant devices for complete voice control
CREATE SCENES AND ROUTINES – Set scenes or put your lights on a schedule, whether at home or away

Connected Max A19 60W Smart LED Bulb

By Cree Lighting

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable

“Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.

  • CONNECTS TO ALEXA: Be sure to enable the Cree Lighting smart skills in the Alexa app
  • QUICK START: Check out the QuickStart guide below for more information regarding bulb setup
  • SUPPORT: For additional support, check the back of your bulb box or user instructions on packaging

Read more

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Connected Max bulbs on a 5GHz router?

No, Connected Max bulbs must be paired to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If you have a multi-band or mesh router, which supports both a both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, you can must connect to the 2.4GHz band. For detailed instructions and more help, download the Connected Max Wireless Router Guide.

What does it mean if my bulb is status is “offline” or the bulb is flashing?

A power outage or router service interruption disconnected the bulb from the network. While the bulbs do not need to have constant power, if the bulb does lose any power for a long duration of time, it might need to be reset. To do that, do not remove the bulb from the app. Just select the plus sign on the main menu in the top right-hand corner of the screen. Add the bulbs with the original steps, and all names and schedules given will remain and bring your bulb back to a functional state

Can I use Connected Max bulbs with a standard wall or lamp dimmer?

No, using with a standard wall or lamp dimmer will cause interference and your bulb will not operate as intended. All Connected Max bulbs are dimmable using the Cree Lighting app or with your connected voice assistant.

Can I turn the Connected Max bulb on or off at the light switch?

No, using a wall or lamp switch to turn off the bulb is not recommended. Turning power off at the switch will make the bulb inoperable in the app or with connected voice assistant. Any schedules or automation will not run as scheduled it power is off at the switch. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at the switch.

Can I use the Connected Max bulbs with a smart switches or plug?

No, since the bulb itself has smart technology built in, there is no need to connect to any other smart switch or plug. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at smart switch or plug.

Can the Connected Max bulbs be used outdoors?

Connected Max PAR38 is designed for use outdoors. Its UL wet rating means it can get wet and exposed directly to weather or water. The rest of the Connected Max family is UL Damp Rated, which means it can be used outdoors in a fixture that is not exposed to weather or water (such as carriage light) as long as they’re protected against weather and water contact. Any bulbs used outdoors need to be within range of your WiFi router. A weak WiFi signal may cause delays or interruptions in your controllability.

4.5

Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

From the brand

Home is the warmest place in the world, without a doubt. And home is the best place to share happiness and joy, with family and friends alike. Decorative lights, in this way, can not only embellish the feeling of home, but also bring spirituality, style, energy, glitz, glamour, and gusto! When the inspiration for decorative lighting jumped into Sylvia Lin’s mind in 2016, she decided to make this dream come true and so the brand Ollny was born!

180LED/60FT Series

240LED/80FT Green Wire Series

240LED/80FT Clear Wire Series

300LED/100FT Series

50LED/25FT Big Bulbs Series

【Multifunctional Remote Control Solar Fairy Lights】① Remote Control: Use the remote to switch the solar fairy lights colors and light modes conveniently( Adjusted on solar panel available too). ② Timer Function: 3 timer function (4/6/8H) to schedule solar string lights work times automatically. ③ Memory Function: Restart solar Christmas lights will keep the last time lighting modes.
【IP67 Waterproof Outdoor Solar Lights】The solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof Rated and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof Rated. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED bulb is incorporated with watertight seals, and the string lights wire are made of copper and PVC which is strong and durable. Feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy/storm/snowy days.
【Highly Efficient Solar Powered String Lights】The large-capacity solar panel only takes 6 hours to full charge under sufficient sunlight, and the lighting work time can reach 18 hours. With higher light control settings, it can work normally when it illuminated by car/ street/ lawn lights. The solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving.
【Outdoor Indoor Decorative Lights】Solar fairy lights automatically ON at night and OFF at dawn. Just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place.Supports ground and wall installation to meet your more needs. Perfect for outdoor/indoor/Christmas decorations, wedding, birthday, party, trees, porch, door, garden, patio, backyard, balcony.

Longer, Brighter, Smoother and More Colorful Solar String Light
  • Length of String Lights : Each 80FT/24m
  • LED Quantity: Each 240 LEDs
  • Mode: 11 Lighting Modes
  • Solar Panel Size: 115*95 mm
  • Material: Copper+PVC
  • Waterproof Rated: IP67
  • Remote Control Distance: 10 meters

Why Choose Ollny Solar String Lights?

  • 2 Pack each 80FT 240LED super long solar string lights meet your more needs.
  • Copper wire wrapped in PVC for adding protection and reducing tangling or knotting.
  • 11 modes: 4 steadies on modes (warm white and 3 different mixture color) and 7 flashing modes.
  • Remote Control+Timer Function (4H. 6H. 8H)+Memory Function (keep the last time lighting modes).
  • IP67 wterproof rated ,available on rainy/storm/snowy days.
  • Large capacity solar panel, charging time about 6 hours (under sufficient sunlight) and working time about 18 hours.
  • Higher light control settings,work normally when it illuminated by car lights / street lights / lawn lights at night.
  • Solar panels can automatically charge both the power button is turned ON and OFF.

Read more

Read more

Do you want to make your house dance at night or decorate the big tree in front of your door? Do you want a romantic wedding or have a lively party? Ollny Solar Fairy Lights comes in warm white and 3 mixture colors, 11 modes can meet your more needs.

Higher Light Control Settings

Ollny solar string light is designed with high-level light control, so this solar fairy lights can work well when illuminated by other lights.( Tip: For better nighttime lighting, please pay attention to the distance between the solar panel and other illuminating light sources.)

Super Bright LED

Ollny 2 pack solar string lights each has 80FT, 240LED, super long and bright. The copper wire is wrapped by protective PVC, which will not be tangled or knotted. And each bright LED maintains a constant brightness until it runs out of power.

IP67 Waterproof

Solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED is incorporated with watertight seals, just feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy, storm, snowy days.

Read more

Adjustable Solar Panel

Ollny solar panels and solar fairy lights are detachable for easy installation and replacement. The solar panel was designed to rotate 180°, which can make it absorbing more solar energy and getting longer working effects.

2 Installation Method

Supports ground and wall installation, just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place. And Ollny solar string lights comes with 2m connection cable, easy to meet your indoor and outdoor decoration needs.

Big Size Solar Panel

4.53*3.74 inch big solar panel size absorb solar energy faster. And the solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving. The back of the solar panel can shows the light working state clearly.

Read more

Just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place.Supports ground and wall installation to meet your more needs. Perfect for outdoor/indoor/Christmas decorations, wedding, birthday, party, trees, porch, door, garden, patio, backyard, balcony.

Longer, Brighter, Smoother and More Colorful Solar String Light
  • Length of String Lights : Each 80FT/24m
  • LED Quantity: Each 240 LEDs
  • Mode: 11 Lighting Modes
  • Solar Panel Size: 115*95 mm
  • Material: Copper+PVC
  • Waterproof Rated: IP67
  • Remote Control Distance: 10 meters

Why Choose Ollny Solar String Lights?

  • 2 Pack each 80FT 240LED super long solar string lights meet your more needs.
  • Copper wire wrapped in PVC for adding protection and reducing tangling or knotting.
  • 11 modes: 4 steadies on modes (warm white and 3 different mixture color) and 7 flashing modes.
  • Remote Control+Timer Function (4H. 6H. 8H)+Memory Function (keep the last time lighting modes).
  • IP67 wterproof rated ,available on rainy/storm/snowy days.
  • Large capacity solar panel, charging time about 6 hours (under sufficient sunlight) and working time about 18 hours.
  • Higher light control settings,work normally when it illuminated by car lights / street lights / lawn lights at night.
  • Solar panels can automatically charge both the power button is turned ON and OFF.

Read more

Read more

Do you want to make your house dance at night or decorate the big tree in front of your door? Do you want a romantic wedding or have a lively party? Ollny Solar Fairy Lights comes in warm white and 3 mixture colors, 11 modes can meet your more needs.

Higher Light Control Settings

Ollny solar string light is designed with high-level light control, so this solar fairy lights can work well when illuminated by other lights.( Tip: For better nighttime lighting, please pay attention to the distance between the solar panel and other illuminating light sources.)

Super Bright LED

Ollny 2 pack solar string lights each has 80FT, 240LED, super long and bright. The copper wire is wrapped by protective PVC, which will not be tangled or knotted. And each bright LED maintains a constant brightness until it runs out of power.

IP67 Waterproof

Solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED is incorporated with watertight seals, just feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy, storm, snowy days.

Read more

Adjustable Solar Panel

Ollny solar panels and solar fairy lights are detachable for easy installation and replacement. The solar panel was designed to rotate 180°, which can make it absorbing more solar energy and getting longer working effects.

2 Installation Method

Supports ground and wall installation, just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place. And Ollny solar string lights comes with 2m connection cable, easy to meet your indoor and outdoor decoration needs.

Big Size Solar Panel

4.53*3.74 inch big solar panel size absorb solar energy faster. And the solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving. The back of the solar panel can shows the light working state clearly.

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:22:55 UTC – Details)


From Sengled: Smart Lighting Expert. Lighting up the world since 1997
Sengled WiFi Classic Smart Light Bulbs are the simplest way to get started with smart lighting.
No hub is required — just install the LED bulb like a standard light bulb and connect it to your home’s 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network. Control the bulb through the Sengled Home app (iOS and Android) to manage the smart lights, including adjusting the brightness, setting schedules, creating scenes and monitoring energy.
You can also control the lights with your voice when paired to your Amazon Alexa devices or Google Assistant smart speakers.
Voice Control: Color changing WiFi Classic smart bulbs that work with Alexa and Google Home. Control your smart light bulb via voice commands to turn your smart bulbs on/off, create colorful mood scenes, adjust brightness and more, e.g. Switch on the Alexa light bulbs before getting out of bed, dim the smart lights from the couch to watch a movie..Special Features:Color Changing
Schedule Feature: Designed with 16 million colors and tunable white (Amber to Cool White, from 2000K to 6500K) with HIGH CRI>90. Easily setup via using Sengled Home App (iOS and Android), turn smart light bulb on/off, dim smart bulb to the desired level and set up schedules from anywhere. Program timers and routines to automate your entire smart home lighting setup. Control your smart light bulbs while away from home.
Remote Control: Enhance your smart home with smart WiFi bulb color changing lights, controlled remotely wherever you are. Set timers and light schedules, automating your smart lights to make it seem like someone is home, even when you are away. You can also create a group for all of your alexa light bulbs, and easily group control your smart light bulbs with Alexa devices or Google Assistant players.
Wake Up & Sleep Mode: Easily setup via using Sengled Home App (iOS and Android). Schedule your smart lights to slowly light up. Starting at the set time, the smart bulbs will slowly brighten throughout the timespan you set. Your lights will slowly get brighter in the morning. And you can also schedule your lights to simulate a sunset so that you can fall asleep more naturally every evening. Your bulbs will slowly dim over the timespan you set.
No Hub Required: Connect to your home’s secure 2.4GHz WiFi network directly (not support 5GHz); No need for a smart hub or extra equipment. All you need is your smartphone, the Sengled Home App and a 2.4GHz WiFi router to start controlling your smart lights from anywhere. 3-Year Warranty. Live customer service based in the U.S.
